title: 148863786.a Map For Everything
excerpt: One of the many benefits of reading broadly and frequently is that you quicky realize there’s an expert for all kinds of somethings.

children.text: One of the many benefits of reading broadly and frequently is that you quicky realize there’s an expert for all kinds of somethings.
And, in that, that there’s a roadmap for almost everything. For any large or small task or feat you could hope to accomplish.
Not a definitive one, perhaps. Not one that works 99.9% of the time.
But advice or frameworks or templates that can help you, significantly.
Perhaps that's why those who make a habit of reading are often successful.
Not because there’s something inherent about
. But because they’ve simply given themselves the luxury of a map (or several) that can help lead them to the outcomes they seek.
